long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Strictly for nerds. 

This basic functionality is out-of-the-box with IE and Firefox, but inexplicably absent in Chrome, which is why it needed to be made.

It remembers link focus when clicking through a list of links. Very handy if you a.) use link lists and b.) use keyboard navigation. 

You simply Tab through links, hit Enter to visit, Backspace to return to the list, and then Tab again to move down the list (or of course Shift+Tab to move up the list).
